title: Origen of Alexandria - Commentaries on Scripture and his influence
description:
This is the last of 4 episodes with Sam and Hank on Origen in our Church Fathers series. In this episode we specifically focus on the Origenist Controversies after his life, "The Commentary of the Gospel of John", "The Commentary on the Gospel of Matthew", and "Dialogue with Heraclides". We hope you enjoy. 

We mention Jordan Peterson, The Emperor Justinian, John Chrysostom, Father John Behr, Jerome, Bishop Barron, Nestorius, Athanasius, Arius, Pope Dyonysius of Alexandria, Epiphanius of Salamis, Augustine of Hippo, Tertullian, Constantine, Paul Vanderklay, Ulrich Zwingli and more. 

Podcast version: https://anchor.fm/transfigured-sam/episodes/Origen-of-Alexandria---Commentaries-on-Scripture-and-his-influence-e1dslaj

First Episode on Origen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N1awPZQ4VXQ
Second Episode on Origen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4JnmsLQ4hA&t=936s
Third Episode on Origen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tsL61NJxIqA&t=2366s

Dale Tuggy on Origen and Heraclides: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3j98WhBemHU

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:03:00 - The afterlife of Origen
00:25:25 - Commentary on the Gospel of John
00:32:30 - John 1 verse 1
00:53:00 - Origen, the Trinity, and Arianism
01:02:30 - Origen and Universalism
01:12:50 - Commentary on the Gospel of Matthew
01:16:50 - Origen on the Eucharist
01:25:30 - Origen's Elitism
01:28:00 - Dialogue with Heraclides
01:34:10 - Concluding Remarks
